description: The file is a TypeScript React-like component file (using Qwik framework) that manages a notes application's main route interface, including fetching, displaying, editing, creating, and deleting notes, as well as search functionality.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Type representing a single note with id, title, content, and updated_at properties.

classes.name: AppState
classes.description: Interface defining the shape of the application's state, including notes array, search term, loading/error flags, editing note info, modal open state, and selected note ID.

methods.name: filteredNotes
methods.description: Function that filters notes based on the search term, returning matching notes.

methods.name: handleEdit
methods.description: Sets the current note to edit and opens the editor modal.

methods.name: handleCreate
methods.description: Prepares a new empty note for creation and opens the editor modal.

methods.name: handleCancel
methods.description: Closes the editor modal without saving changes.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Saves the note (creates or updates), refreshes the notes list, and manages loading/error states.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Deletes a note and updates the notes list accordingly.

methods.name: handleSelect
methods.description: Sets the currently selected note ID.

methods.name: setSearchTerm
methods.description: Updates the search term in the state.
